shelf_life.properties: Moisture barrier, seals in freshness, prevents contamination.

shelf_life.properties: Controls gas composition (CO2, O2, N2) to slow spoilage.

Included in egg packaging (less common) to absorb ethylene from any nearby produce, preventing off-flavors.
